events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product sent does not match what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Your case has been assigned to an agent specializing in refunds for further assistance.
Hello! I’m here to help you with the refund process for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and pictures of the item you received compared to your original order confirmation?
My order number is 12345678, and I’ve attached photos showing the item I got is completely different from what was advertised.
Thank you for the details. I have processed your refund, and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help! I appreciate the fast refund processing.
Your refund case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and everything is satisfactory.
We are closing your refund case now. Thank you for contacting support!
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your recent support experience.
